goal.ch: This course aims to impart a foundational understanding of spatial statistics and to instruct students in the utilization of R for the analysis of spatial data.
goal.en: This course aims to impart a foundational understanding of spatial statistics and to instruct students in the utilization of R for the analysis of spatial data.

outline.ch:
Course materials, including lecture notes and handouts, will be accessible online and will encompass the following subject matter:
1. Geostatistics
2. Spatial models on lattices
3. Spatial point patterns
4. Space-time models
outline.en:
Course materials, including lecture notes and handouts, will be accessible online and will encompass the following subject matter:
1. Geostatistics
2. Spatial models on lattices
3. Spatial point patterns
4. Space-time models

textbook.ch:
1. Cressie, N. (1993). Statistics for Spatial Data, revised edition. Wiley: New York 
2. Schabenberger, O. and Gotway, C. A. (2005). Statistical Methods for Spatial Data Analysis. Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC： Boca Raton
3. Wikle, C.K., Zammit-Mangion, A., and Cressie, N. (2019). Spatio-Temporal 
Statistics with R. Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC, Boca Raton, FL (download at 
https://spacetimewithr.org/)
textbook.en:
1. Cressie, N. (1993). Statistics for Spatial Data, revised edition. Wiley: New York 
2. Schabenberger, O. and Gotway, C. A. (2005). Statistical Methods for Spatial Data Analysis. Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC： Boca Raton
3. Wikle, C.K., Zammit-Mangion, A., and Cressie, N. (2019). Spatio-Temporal 
Statistics with R. Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC, Boca Raton, FL (download at 
https://spacetimewithr.org/)

ch: 學制:限學士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
